entry.title: Combined summary - 0.3.24 RC3 Build
entry.summary: A new version of Bitcoin, the Bitcoin 0.3.24 RC3 tar has been uploaded to http://dl.dropbox.com/u/29653426/Bitcoin%200.3.24%20RC3.tar.bz2, accompanied by the SHA1 checksum af85f46201bfffaf38fe4d64f3aa357ac03b51e1. However, there are disagreements about compatibility and it has been noted that gitian-win32.yml is broken. As a result, some lines should be removed for consistency. The build should be gitian signed and email signed as always.
